name: Spaceship Landing - Fly through the universe
name_original: Spaceship Landing - Fly through the universe
description:
___________________________________ 
„I feel like a true astronaut”
„Cool spaceship”
„Addictive!”
___________________________________

Traveling through space can be hard. Flying objects all over with high speed! Now try to land your spaceship in space! Keep your ship steady to land or else you will destroy your spaceship. Land as many ships as possible in time to get your high score. So always wanted to be a astronaut? Or fly through space? Take this chance and prove yourself to be the best pilot there is!

Download Spaceship Lander today while its FREE!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Available for iPhone/iPad
Amazing graphics
Fun and addictive gameplay
100% FREE by ads
Upgrade to ad-free version
Hours of playing fun
Turn on/off the music
